name: Auto Risk Risk
description:
An auto battler game that I created because I felt that the current assortment och auto battlers were not very good.

This one's a deck builder version of the auto battler. The characters you select are added to a deck and randomly placed during battles. 

Defeat the AI and become the strategy master!

There are plans to maybe rework this game with a completely new IP and more features. Leave a comment if you're interested :D
